author: remm
msg: - Fix small filter extension mapping bug: if the extension of the request starts
with the tested path, it would have been matched (bug 22546).

author: remm
msg: - Bug 22698: Restore RealmBase.main(). There doesn't seem to be any side
effect, so there's no reason to remove it at this time.

author: remm
msg: - Reenable validation (there are still problems validating TLDs, even with

author: remm
msg: - I was suddenly getting some java.lang.ExceptionInInitializerError when running
the task after JSPC (running it without JSPC worked ok), related with commons-logging
(as usual). I'm not sure how real this bug is (diffing revealed the code didn't change at
al), but setting the context classloader makes c-l happy.

author: remm
msg: - Wrap getCanonicalFile in a try/catch (bug 22691). If the classpath or a CL has dubious
entries, they will simply be ignored.
